short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension designed to help people quickly label their email threads

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: TreeSwipe is a Chrome extension that helps you to quickly label your email threads. It does so by giving you a decision tree, or "branching paths", to answer yes/no questions until each email thread is labeled. This extension is particularly useful for people who get stuck in decision/analysis paralysis, have hundreds or thousands of email threads in their inbox, or both.
